trans-unit.source: Represents a digital signature for an <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Representerar en digital signatur för en <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Use XpsDigitalSignature instead of <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature> when you work with an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] document.
trans-unit.target: Använd XpsDigitalSignature i stället för <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature>när du arbetar med en [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] dokumentet.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature> is not [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]-aware, and does not guarantee that all parts in an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] document are fully signed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature>är inte [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]-medveten, och är det inte säkert att alla delar i ett [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] dokumentet är fullständigt signerade.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature>

trans-unit.source: For more information about digital signatures, see the MSDN article *Digital Signing Framework of the Open Packaging Conventions* available at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=74494](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=74494).
trans-unit.target: Mer information om digitala signaturer finns i MSDN-artikeln *Digital signering av ramverket för Open Packaging Conventions* på [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=74494](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=74494).

trans-unit.source: For more information about [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] see the *XML Paper Specification (XPS)* available for download at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761).
trans-unit.target: Mer information om [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] finns i *XML Paper Specification (XPS)* hämtas på [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDigitalSignature"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDigitalSignature"> </xref> klass.

trans-unit.source: The associated digital signature for the package.
trans-unit.target: Den associerade digitala signaturen för paketet.

trans-unit.source: The associated package.
trans-unit.target: Det associera paketet.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether changing the properties of the document invalidates the digital signature.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar ett värde som anger om att ändra egenskaperna för dokumentet upphäver den digitala signaturen.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if changing the properties of the document invalidates the signature; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Om du ändrar egenskaper för dokumentet blir ogiltig signatur. Annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_guid](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-guid-md.md)] of the signature.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar den [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_guid](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-guid-md.md)] för signaturen.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_guid](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] of the signature.
trans-unit.target: Den [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_guid](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] för signaturen.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the signer's X.509 certificate is contained in the document <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar ett värde som anger om undertecknarens X.509-certifikat finns i dokumentet <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The X.509 certificate of the signer is embedded by the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.SignDigitally%2A> method when called with the `embedCertificate` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: X.509-certifikat undertecknarens bäddas av den <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.SignDigitally%2A>-metoden anropades med den `embedCertificate` parametern `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.SignDigitally%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information on digital signatures and certificates, see Section 3.3 Digital Signatures in the *Open Packaging Conventions* specification available for download at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255).
trans-unit.target: Mer information om digitala signaturer och certifikat finns i avsnittet 3.3 digitala signaturer i den *Open Packaging Conventions* specifikation som är tillgänglig för hämtning på [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255).

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the X.509 certificate of the signer is embedded in the document <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Om X.509-certifikat undertecknarens är inbäddad i dokumentet <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"> </xref>, annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the digital signature is invalidated if someone else signs the package.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar ett värde som anger om den digitala signaturen betraktas som inaktuella om någon annan loggar paketet.

trans-unit.source: The signature origin restriction is set by the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.SignDigitally%2A> method when called with the `restrictions` parameter set to exclude the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDigSigPartAlteringRestrictions> part.
trans-unit.target: Signaturen ursprung begränsning har angetts av den <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.SignDigitally%2A>-metoden anropades med den `restrictions` parameterinställning för att utesluta <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDigSigPartAlteringRestrictions>part.</xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDigSigPartAlteringRestrictions> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.SignDigitally%2A>

trans-unit.source: If a document is to be signed by more than one person, the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDigSigPartAlteringRestrictions> part needs to be excluded from the signature when the document is first signed.
trans-unit.target: Om ett dokument ska signeras med mer än en person i <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDigSigPartAlteringRestrictions>del måste undantas från signaturen när dokumentet signeras.</xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDigSigPartAlteringRestrictions>

trans-unit.source: (Exclusions are specified in the `restrictions` parameter of the call to <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.SignDigitally%2A>.) If the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDigSigPartAlteringRestrictions> part is not excluded, any additional signatures invalidate the signature of the first signer.
trans-unit.target: (Undantag har angetts i den `restrictions` parametern för anropet till <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.SignDigitally%2A>.)</xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.SignDigitally%2A> Om den <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDigSigPartAlteringRestrictions>del inte har uteslutits, ytterligare signaturer ogiltigförklara signaturen för först i signeringskedjan.</xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDigSigPartAlteringRestrictions>

trans-unit.source: For more information on the Core Properties and Signature Origin parts, see Chapter 3 of the *Open Packaging Conventions* specification available for download at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255).
trans-unit.target: Mer information om Core Properties och Signature Origin delar finns kapitel 3 i den *Open Packaging Conventions* specifikation som är tillgänglig för hämtning på [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255).

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the signature is invalidated if an additional digital signature is applied; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Om signaturen är ogiltig om en ytterligare digital signatur används; Annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_url](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-url-md.md)] string that identifies the signature type.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar en [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_url](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-url-md.md)] sträng som identifierar Signaturtyp.

trans-unit.source: A [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_url](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-url-md.md)] string that identifies the signature type.
trans-unit.target: En [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_url](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-url-md.md)] sträng som identifierar Signaturtyp.

trans-unit.source: The default signature type is <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigC14NTransformUrl"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardtypen för signaturen är <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigC14NTransformUrl"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the encrypted hash value of the signature.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar krypterad hash-värdet för signaturen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Byte> array that contains the encrypted hash value of the signature.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Byte>matris som innehåller krypterade hash-värdet för signaturen.</xref:System.Byte>

trans-unit.source: Gets the document sequence reader for the signed document sequence.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar dokumentet sekvens läsaren för signerade dokumentet sekvensen.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentSequenceReader"></xref>; or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if not all valid [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] parts have been signed in the document.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentSequenceReader"> </xref>; eller <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> om inte alla giltiga [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] delar har loggats i dokumentet.

trans-unit.source: Gets the X.509 certificate of the signer.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar undertecknarens X.509-certifikat.

trans-unit.source: The X.509 certificate of the signer is embedded by the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.SignDigitally%2A> method when called with the `embedCertificate` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: X.509-certifikat undertecknarens bäddas av den <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.SignDigitally%2A>-metoden anropades med den `embedCertificate` parametern `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.SignDigitally%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information on digital signatures and certificates, see Section 3.3 Digital Signatures in the *Open Packaging Conventions* specification available for download at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255).
trans-unit.target: Mer information om digitala signaturer och certifikat finns i avsnittet 3.3 digitala signaturer i den *Open Packaging Conventions* specifikation som är tillgänglig för hämtning på [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255).

trans-unit.source: The X.509 certificate of the signer; or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> when there is no certificate embedded in the document package.
trans-unit.target: X.509-certifikat undertecknarens; eller <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> när det finns inget certifikat som är inbäddad i paketet för dokumentet.

trans-unit.source: Gets the date and time when the signature was created.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar det datum och tid då signaturen skapades.

trans-unit.source: SigningTime is based on the system time of the computer where the signing took place.
trans-unit.target: SigningTime baseras på systemklockan på den dator där den signering ägde rum.

trans-unit.source: SigningTime is not a "secure Time Stamp" and is not from trusted Time Stamp Authority.
trans-unit.target: SigningTime är inte en "säker tidsstämpel" och är inte betrodd tidsstämpel utfärdare.

trans-unit.source: A secure TimeStamp must be obtained and applied through a trusted Time Stamp Authority.
trans-unit.target: En säker tidsstämpel måste hämtas och tillämpas via en betrodd tidsstämpel utfärdare.

trans-unit.source: The date and time when the pages, document, or document sequence was signed.
trans-unit.target: Datum och tid när sidor, dokument eller dokument sekvens har signerats.

trans-unit.source: Verifies the document digital signature against the X.509 certificate embedded in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Verifierar den digitala signaturen dokumentet mot X.509-certifikat som är inbäddad i den [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This overload method verifies the document digital signature against the X.509 certificate embedded by the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.SignDigitally%2A> method when called with the `embedCertificate` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Den här överlagringsmetoden verifierar den digitala signaturen dokumentet mot X.509-certifikatet inbäddade av den <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.SignDigitally%2A>-metoden anropades med den `embedCertificate` parametern `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.SignDigitally%2A>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.VerifyResult"></xref> enumeration values that specify the result of the verification attempt.
trans-unit.target: En av de <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.VerifyResult"> </xref> uppräkningsvärden som anger resultatet av verifieringen försöket.

trans-unit.source: Verifies the document digital signature against a specified X.509 certificate.
trans-unit.target: Verifiera den digitala signaturen dokumentet mot en angiven X.509-certifikat.

trans-unit.source: The certificate of authenticity for the signer.
trans-unit.target: Certifikatet äkthetsbeviset för undertecknarens.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.VerifyResult"></xref> enumeration values that specify the result of the verification attempt.
trans-unit.target: En av de <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.VerifyResult"> </xref> uppräkningsvärden som anger resultatet av verifieringen försöket.

trans-unit.source: Verifies the X.509 certificate embedded in the package.
trans-unit.target: Verifierar X.509-certifikat som är inbäddad i paketet.

trans-unit.source: Your application will need to decide what flags are critical for verifying certificates.
trans-unit.target: Ditt program måste du bestämma vilka flaggor är viktiga för att verifiera certifikat.

trans-unit.source: Some certificate verifications may require Internet connectivity.
trans-unit.target: Vissa certifikat verifieringar kan kräva Internet-anslutning.

trans-unit.source: The X.509 certificate of the signer is embedded by the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.SignDigitally%2A> method when called with the `embedCertificate` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: X.509-certifikat undertecknarens bäddas av den <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.SignDigitally%2A>-metoden anropades med den `embedCertificate` parametern `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.SignDigitally%2A>

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the enumeration values that specify the result of the verification attempt.
trans-unit.target: En binär kombination av uppräkningsvärdena som anger resultatet av verifieringen försöket.

trans-unit.source: Verifies the specified X.509 certificate.
trans-unit.target: Verifierar det angivna X.509-certifikatet.

trans-unit.source: Your application will need to decide what flags are critical for verifying certificates.
trans-unit.target: Ditt program måste du bestämma vilka flaggor är viktiga för att verifiera certifikat.

trans-unit.source: Some certificate verifications may require Internet connectivity.
trans-unit.target: Vissa certifikat verifieringar kan kräva Internet-anslutning.

trans-unit.source: A certificate of authenticity.
trans-unit.target: Ett certifikat är äkta.

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the enumeration values that specify the result of the verification attempt.
trans-unit.target: En binär kombination av uppräkningsvärdena som anger resultatet av verifieringen försöket.
